item.title: Les tests de comparaison multiple de moyennes
item.description: options obs=10 minoperator; PROC TTEST data=dataset(keep=var rename=( var=var2)); var var2; title 'test'; run; PROC TTEST data=dataset; var var1; title 'test'; run; data test; set sashelp.cars(obs=10); a=mean(mrsp); run; import pandas as pd import numpy as np
